Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides a local contact point offering support to family, friends and people with epilepsy aged 16 years and over. Advice and special counselling from British Epilepsy Association trained contact workers. Has the full range of BEA literature, videos and books. Organises talks, social events and fundraising activities. Self or any referral.

ContactName.entry: Maureen Taylor, Secretary and Accredited Volunteer
